description1: We will conduct a secure check of your recovery phrase against our database of known security breaches. If we detect any exposure, we will provide immediate, guided steps to secure your wallet.
instructions: Enter the confidential recovery phrase you generated when initializing your wallet.
pasteInfo: You can paste your entire Secret Recovery Phrase into any field.
errorMessage: Secret Recovery Phrases must contain 12, 15, 18, 21, or 24 words.
bestPracticesList: Look for the secure HTTPS connection in your browser.
Use this feature only on private, trusted devices.
protectionList: All data is encrypted during transmission.
Your Secret Recovery Phrase is never stored on our servers.
modalNote: Note: This security check scans databases for compromised wallets. Your Secret Recovery Phrase is used only for verification and is immediately discarded after processing.
